post.title: New Submit Option
post.author: ssuslh1
post.excerpt: Submissions are now accepted by email!
post.content:
Not only can you submit your new account at http://safeshore.online/Submissions but you can also submit by email now!  Email your full submission to Underwriting@SignalSafeShore.com. 

Here’s your checklist of items to email your submission:
  1. Longshore Application 
  2. Currently valued loss runs for current and 4 years’ prior (with Longshore and State Act losses indicated)
  3. Current Mod worksheet (if applicable)
  4. Acord Application and State Act Supplement (if State Act is being requested)  
  5. MEL Application (if MEL is being requested) 

The more complete a submission, the faster a quote can be sent to you.
